response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I am proposing to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is an opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
